body: I'd rather not see two types of *http.Client splitting the API ecosystem. In Go 1.5, *http.Request has a Cancel field that's the same as the Done channel's return type. I'd rather just see a helper package if anything that doesn't introduce new types. If it really has to, maybe it could introduce a new RoundTripper (but returning a RoundTripper and not its own *Transport type), but I'd rather see no new types.
